00212     bool moveChecked();
00220     double gap2pred(const MSVehicle & pred) const
00221     {
00222         SUMOReal gap = pred.getPositionOnLane() - pred.getVehicleType().getLengthWithGap() - getPositionOnLane();
00223         if(gap < 0 && gap > -1.0e-12){
00224             gap = 0;
00225         }
00226         return gap;
00227     }
00228 
00236     inline static double gap(double predPos, double predLength, double pos)
00237     {
00238         return predPos - predLength - pos;
00239     }

00369     static bool overlap(const MSVehicle *veh1, const MSVehicle *veh2)
00370     {
00371         if(veh1->myState.myPos < veh2->myState.myPos){
00372             return veh2->myState.myPos - veh2->getVehicleType().getLengthWithGap() < veh1->myState.myPos;
00373         }
00374         return veh1->myState.myPos - veh1->getVehicleType().getLengthWithGap() < veh2->myState.myPos;
00375     }
00376 
00379     bool congested() const
00380     {
00381         return myState.mySpeed < SUMOReal(60) / SUMOReal(3.6);
00382     }

00629     void switchOnSignal(int signal)
00630     {
00631         mySignals |= signal;

00633 
00637     void switchOffSignal(int signal)
00638     {
00639         mySignals &= ~signal;
00640     }
